languages.text: "Ты исполнил{mf||а} свой долг, элантах. Отныне у Лилэтан есть надежда на будущее — будущее без Сай'лантреш и ее последователей. Миру еще предстоит очиститься, но всему свое время. Сейчас же — время поблагодарить тебя". {n}Ирлиэт едва заметно склоняет голову.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Ты выполнил{mf||а} свою часть сделки. Теперь, когда глава культа мертва, ее последователи затаятся по своим логовам... но для моих братьев это не станет препятствием. Скоро Лилэтан будет очищен от последователей Сай'лантреш и следов их деяний".

languages.text: "You have done your duty, elantach. From now on, the Lilaethan has hope for the future — a future without Sai'lanthresh and her followers. This world has yet to be cleansed, but there is a time for everything. Now is the time to thank you." {n}Yrliet bows her head slightly.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Ты исполнил{mf||а} свой долг, элантах. Отныне у Лилэтан есть надежда на будущее — будущее без Сай'лантреш и ее последователей. Миру еще предстоит очиститься, но всему свое время. Сейчас же — время поблагодарить тебя". {n}Ирлиэт едва заметно склоняет голову.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "You held up your end of the deal, Rogue Trader. Now that the cult leader is dead, her followers will hide away in their lairs... but that will prove no obstacle for my brethren. Soon the Lilaethan will be purged of followers of Sai'lanthresh and all traces of their deeds."

"You held up your end of the deal, Rogue Trader. Now that the cult leader is dead, her followers will hide away in their lairs... but that will prove no obstacle for my brethren. Soon the Lilaethan will be purged of followers of Sai'lanthresh and all traces of their deeds."

"You held up your end of the deal, Rogue Trader. Now that the cult leader is dead, her followers will hide away in their lairs... but that will prove no obstacle for my brethren. Soon the Lilaethan will be purged of followers of Sai'lanthresh and all traces of their deeds."

"You held up your end of the deal. Now that the cult leader is dead, her followers will hide away in their lairs... but that will prove no obstacle for my brethren. Soon the Lilaethan will be purged of followers of Sai'lanthresh and all traces of their deeds."

"You have done your duty, elantach. From now on, the Lilaethan has hope for the future — a future without Sai'lanthresh and her followers. This world has yet to be cleansed, but there is a time for everything. Now is the time to thank you." {n}Yrliet bows her head slightly.{/n}

languages.text: “你完成了你的职责，外界人。从现在开始，莉莱赞又有了希望，她将迎来没有赛·兰斯雷什与她的追随者的未来。尽管这个世界还没有被彻底净化，但凡事都要慢慢来。现在，是时候向你致谢了。”{n}伊莉耶特微微低下了头。{/n}
languages.original_text: "You have done your duty, elantach. From now on, the Lilaethan has hope for the future — a future without Sai'lanthresh and her followers. This world has yet to be cleansed, but there is a time for everything. Now is the time to thank you." {n}Yrliet bows her head slightly.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “你完成了你的职责，外界人。从现在开始，莉莱赞又有了希望，她将迎来没有赛·兰斯雷什与她的追随者的未来。尽管这个世界还没有被彻底净化，但凡事都要慢慢来。现在，是时候向你致谢了。”{n}伊莉耶特微微低下了头。{/n}

languages.text: «Has cumplido con tu deber, elantach. A partir de ahora, el Lilaethan tiene esperanza para el futuro: uno sin Sai'lanthresh y sus seguidores. Este mundo aún necesita una purga, pero todo tiene su momento, y ahora es el de darte las gracias». {n}Yrliet inclina levemente la cabeza.{/n}
languages.original_text: "You have done your duty, elantach. From now on, the Lilaethan has hope for the future — a future without Sai'lanthresh and her followers. This world has yet to be cleansed, but there is a time for everything. Now is the time to thank you." {n}Yrliet bows her head slightly.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Has cumplido con tu deber, elantach. A partir de ahora, el Lilaethan tiene esperanza para el futuro: uno sin Sai'lanthresh y sus seguidores. Este mundo aún necesita una purga, pero todo tiene su momento, y ahora es el de darte las gracias». {n}Yrliet inclina levemente la cabeza.{/n}

languages.text: 「義務を果たしたな、エランタ。今後、リラエタンは未来に希望を持てる。セランスレッシュとその従者がいない未来を。この星はまだ浄化されていないが、何事にも時宜がある。今は礼を言おう」{n}ユリエットはわずかに頭を下げて一礼した。{/n}
languages.original_text: "You have done your duty, elantach. From now on, the Lilaethan has hope for the future — a future without Sai'lanthresh and her followers. This world has yet to be cleansed, but there is a time for everything. Now is the time to thank you." {n}Yrliet bows her head slightly.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「義務を果たしたな、エランタ。今後、リラエタンは未来に希望を持てる。セランスレッシュとその従者がいない未来を。この星はまだ浄化されていないが、何事にも時宜がある。今は礼を言おう」{n}ユリエットはわずかに頭を下げて一礼した。{/n}

languages.text: "Ihr habt Eure Pflicht getan, Elantach. Von nun an darf Lileath wieder auf eine Zukunft hoffen – eine Zukunft ohne Sai'lanthresh und ihre Anhänger. Diese Welt muss noch gesäubert werden, aber alles hat seine Zeit. Und jetzt ist die Zeit, Euch zu danken." {n}Yrliet senkt leicht ihren Kopf.{/n}
languages.original_text: "You have done your duty, elantach. From now on, the Lilaethan has hope for the future — a future without Sai'lanthresh and her followers. This world has yet to be cleansed, but there is a time for everything. Now is the time to thank you." {n}Yrliet bows her head slightly.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Ihr habt Eure Pflicht getan, Elantach. Von nun darf Lileath wieder auf eine Zukunft hoffen – eine Zukunft ohne Sai'lanthresh und ihre Anhänger. Diese Welt muss noch gesäubert werden, aber alles hat seine Zeit. Und jetzt ist die Zeit, Euch zu danken." {n}Yrliet senkt leicht ihren Kopf.{/n}

languages.text: « Votre devoir est accompli, elantach. Vous avez rendu l'espoir à la lilaethan, qui se dirige désormais vers un avenir sans Sai'lanthresh ni ses fidèles. Ce monde a toujours besoin d'être purifié, mais chaque chose en son temps. Pour l'heure, je tiens à vous remercier. » {n}Yrliet incline légèrement la tête.{/n}
languages.original_text: "You have done your duty, elantach. From now on, the Lilaethan has hope for the future — a future without Sai'lanthresh and her followers. This world has yet to be cleansed, but there is a time for everything. Now is the time to thank you." {n}Yrliet bows her head slightly.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Votre devoir est accompli, elantach. Vous avez rendu l'espoir à la lilaethan, qui se dirige désormais vers un avenir sans Sai'lanthresh ni ses fidèles. Ce monde a toujours besoin d'être purifié, mais chaque chose en son temps. Pour l'heure, je tiens à vous remercier. » {n}Yrliet incline légèrement la tête.{/n}

languages.text: "Görevini yerine getirdin elantach. Artık Lilaethan'ın gelecek için, Sai'lanthresh ve müritlerinin olmadığı bir gelecek için bir umudu var. Dünya hâlâ temizlenmiş değil ama her şey sırayla. Şu an sırada sana teşekkür etmek var." {n}Yrliet başını hafifçe eğiyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "You have done your duty, elantach. From now on, the Lilaethan has hope for the future — a future without Sai'lanthresh and her followers. This world has yet to be cleansed, but there is a time for everything. Now is the time to thank you." {n}Yrliet bows her head slightly.{/n}
